Good to see you again, ComputerTutor. What exactly would we need to do?
You two will have to predict the writer’s purpose for each book. Then click on the ‘purpose cart’ where you think the book belongs.
Oh I see. We have to place the books on the right cart according to the author's purpose. Sounds simple.
Item.speech: Oh I see. We have to place the books on the right cart according to the author's purpose. Sounds simple.

Item.text: _user_, let's have a little competition to see who place the most books in the correct 'purpose cart.' Are you ready? Let's go!

Question.text: _user_, please read over the instructions. When you feel you understand the instructions, please click the green button to start this activity
_user_, if you understand the instructions, please click, "Click to Continue" to start this activity
_user_ and ComputerStudent1, here is the first book. _user_ Does this book belong in the inform, entertain, or persuade cart?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: The Better Angels of Our Nature tries to convince or persuade the reader that violence has declined. Therefore it should go into the Persuade Cart.

Question.text: Here comes the second book. _user_ which cart should it go in to?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: Fresh Food Fast Week night Meals provides instructions for cooking. Therefore it should go into the Inform Cart.

Question.text: Look at the title and description for this book. _user_ Which cart is the right one?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: Things Fall Apart is a narrative story about an African man. Therefore it should go into the Entertain Cart.

Question.text: Let's try one more. _user_ can you predict what purpose the writer had for writing this book?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: The Death and Life of the Great American School System tries to argue and convince the reader that testing and choice are undermining education. Therefore, it should go into the Persuade Cart.

Question.text: Here is another title and description. _user_ Try to figure out the author's purpose.

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: Hip Pop Matters attempts to argue and convince people why one should care about hip pop music. Therefore it should go into the Persuade Cart.

Question.text: You both are doing great. Let's keep practicing. Read the title and the description. _user_ Which cart is the right one?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: Give and Take provides information on why helping others drives our success. Therefore it should go into the inform Cart.

Question.text: _user_ and ComputerStudent1, this is the next book. _user_ On which cart should it go?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: Beautiful Ruins is a romantic tale. Therefore it should go into the Entertain Cart.

Question.text: What about this book? _user_ What is the writer's purpose here?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: The Joy Luck Club is a story about Chinese women and Chinese families. Therefore, it should go into the Entertain Cart.

Question.text: Let's practice some more, here is another book and description. _user_ what is the purpose of this book?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: One Hundred Years of Solitude is a story about the fictional characters in the village of Macondo. Therefore it should go into the Entertain Cart.

Question.text: Here is our next book. _user_, Which cart should this go in?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: Eleven Rings is a biography on the famous head coach of Chicago Bulls Phil Jackson. Therefore it should go into the Inform Cart.

Question.text: Let's keep going. Read the title and the description. _user_, What is the writer's purpose?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: How to Repair Your Car is another instruction manual on how to repair your car. Therefore, it should go into the Inform Cart.

Question.text: What about this book? _user_, What is the author trying to do here?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: The Encyclopedia of Natural Medicine is a reference book on the topic of natural medicine. Therefore, it should go into the Inform Cart.

Question.text: _user_,What is the purpose of this book?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: And the Mountain Echoed is a folk tale about the children of Afganistan. Therefore it should go into the Entertain Cart

Question.text: OK, let's keep going. How about this one.

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: The Death of Money tries to persuade the reader that our monetary system is collapsing. Therefore it should go into the Persuade Cart.

Question.text: This is our last book to file. _user_, What do you predict is the writer's purpose for writing this text?

Answer.name: UserCorrect
Answer.text: Salt Water Tears is an eyewitness account of the dolphin hunt slaughter of Taiji. It provides information about the dolplin hunt. Therefore it should go into the Inform Cart.
